metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9756 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
arch/x86/kvm/emulate.c in the Linux kernel before 4.8.12 does not properly initialize Code Segment (CS) in certain error cases, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information from kernel stack memory via a crafted application. Dmitry Vyukov discovered that the KVM implementation in the Linux kernel did not properly initialize the Code Segment (CS) in certain error cases. A local attacker could use this to expose sensitive information (kernel memory).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9756` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-59-generic - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-4.4.0-59-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-4.4.0-59-lowlatency - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-4.4.0-59-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-4.4.0-59-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-4.4.0-59-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-4.4.0-59-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-59-generic - 4.4.0-59.80
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-aws - 4.4.0-1003.12
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic-lpae - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-lowlatency - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-59-generic - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-4.4.0-59-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-4.4.0-59-lowlatency - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-4.4.0-59-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-59.80
linux-image-4.4.0-59-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-59.80

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1

notes.Note: jdstrand> android kernels (flo, goldfish, grouper, maguro, mako and manta) are not supported on the Ubuntu Touch 14.10 and earlier preview kernels linux-lts-saucy no longer receives official support linux-lts-quantal no longer receives official support

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-59.80').
linux-aws package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1003.12').
linux-gke package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1003.3').
linux-hwe package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1').
linux-signed package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-59.80').
linux-signed-hwe package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1').
